title: **STUNNING BRAND NEW 2 BED/2 BATH APT WITH FULL AMENITIES IN ASTORIA**
posting_body: ['26-41 3rd Street.', 'Introducing a new take on premium luxury living in the Hallets Cove of Astoria.', 'Astor on Third is the area’s newest development featuring condo-style floor plans, premium finishes, picturesque views of Manhattan over the East River, coupled with an array of favorable building amenities including a fitness center, rooftop, lounge, workspace, pet spa, theater, laundry facility (select units with W+D) and parking garage.', 'Dishwasher', 'Doorman', 'Elevator', 'Pets Allowed', 'Washer / Dryer in Unit', 'Private Outdoor Space', 'Building Amenities', 'Bike Room', "Children's Playroom", 'Community Recreation Facilities', 'Garage Parking', 'Gym', 'Laundry in Building', 'Locker/Cage', 'Media Room', 'Package Room', 'Parking Available', 'Virtual Doorman', 'Wheelchair Access', 'Listing Amenities', 'Central Air', 'City View', 'Hardwood Floors', 'Park View', 'Roof Rights', 'Skyline View', 'Water View', 'Outdoor Space', 'Balcony', 'Courtyard', 'Deck', 'Patio', 'Roof Deck', 'Roof Rights', '1 YEAR LEASE.', 'Pictures may be of Similar Unit*']
